document.full_text: the fund bp  set up to deal with compensation claims after 2010's gulf of mexico oil spill is starting to wind down after paying out around $4 billion of the $20 billion set aside by the oil firm, the sunday telegraph reported.
document.title: bp spill fund winding down after $4 billion paid out: report
lines_and_colors: the fund bp  set up to deal with compensation claims after 2010's gulf of mexico oil spill is starting to wind down after paying out around $4 billion of the $20 billion set aside by the oil firm, the sunday telegraph reported.
